name: Untitled Glue Game
description:
Grab it! Glue it! Fix it!

A game made in 48h during the Global Game Jam 2020.

⚠Alert!!⚠ This game was designed to play with joysticks, particularly with a default XBOX controller, but any controller with analog sticks and triggers should work.

You can test the game with WASD + C for the left hand and IJKL + N for the right hand, but this will result in a poor experience

Enjoy~
